SELECT * , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(funding_pay_amt),0) FROM funding_user WHERE funding_project_idx = project_idx) AS funding_amt
,l.like_mem_email, l.like_status
FROM project_info p
LEFT JOIN like_ l ON p.project_code = l.like_project_code AND l.like_mem_email = #{sId}
WHERE p.funding_start_date < now() && p.funding_end_date > now() && p.project_status = '승인'
ORDER BY funding_amt DESC
